<br>

 

<p>We are incredibly excited to announce the third workshop held by the LMU Open Science Initiative in Medicine (OSIM):</p><p style="text-align: center;"><strong>"Publication of clinical studies"</strong></p><p>The workshop will be online, consisting of two lectures followed by an open discussion:</p><ul>
<li>Dr. Till Bruckner (Founder of <a href="https://www.transparimed.org/">TranspariMED</a>): "Research waste and evidence distortion in medicine: Missing clinical trial results in Munich and beyond?"</li>
<li>Dr. Anja Baumgartner (Quality and Study Manager of <a href="https://www.lmu-klinikum.de/innere-medizin-3">Med. Clinic III, LMU Hospital</a>): "Veröffentlichung der Ergebnisse klinischer Prüfungen - Herausforderungen in der Praxis"</li>
<li>
</li>
</ul>
<p>No registration is necessary. More detailed information can be found below:</p><p><img style="display: block; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto;" src="../../images/osim_workshop_publication.jpg" alt="osim_workshop_publication"></p><div class="g-clear"></div>
